bibl.title: T. Hägg and R.H. Pierce, Greek, Latin, and Coptic Sources for Nubian History (III). The Blemmyan Documents from Gebelen.
bibl.note: Corpus of 13 documents, some written in Greek and others written partly in Greek and partly in Coptic. The corpus appears to have come from a single find or at least from a single archive. The texts are based on the previous editions. Date: some time during the last 150 years of Byzantine rule in Egypt.
bibl.seg: Eide T., T. Hägg and R.H. Pierce, Greek, Latin, and Coptic Sources for Nubian History (III). The Blemmyan Documents from Gebelen.

Corpus of 13 documents, some written in Greek and others written partly in Greek and partly in Coptic. The corpus appears to have come from a single find or at least from a single archive. The texts are based on the previous editions. Date: some time during the last 150 years of Byzantine rule in Egypt.
